project.description:
Generate status page for Groovy.
Generated from catkin-rpms/resources/static_jobs. Do not edit on Jenkins but in the repository.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x
#stop on error set -o errexit
rm -rf catkin-rpms git clone git://github.com/smd-ros-devel/catkin-rpms.git -b master
export PYTHONPATH=$WORKSPACE/catkin-rpms $WORKSPACE/catkin-rpms/scripts/generate_status_page.py groovy --basedir $WORKSPACE/groovy_yum_cache
scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $WORKSPACE/groovy_apt_cache/groovy.* wgs32:/var/www/www.ros.org/html/rpmbuild/
